{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15239v1", "title": "Toeplitz operators on large vector-valued Fock spaces", "summary": "We characterize boundedness and compactness of Toeplitz operators on large
vector-valued Fock spaces with Dall'Ara's weights [Adv.\ Math., 285 (2015)
1706--1740] in terms of generalized Berezin transforms, averaging functions,
and Carleson measures. To determine Schatten class Toeplitz operators, we
introduce the operator-valued Berezin transform and averaging functions.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-04-21T17:13:50Z"}
